title: Altrincham
name: Altrincham Market
content: Visit the market in the town centre where local produce, and many other things can be bought. There is a Farmers' Market on the 1st Friday of each month. Every Thursday and Friday evening in the run up to Xmas they hold twighlight markets with stall, food, drink and music. The market has recently been refurbished and the old market hall is now all about eating and drinking even a real ale bar has appeared.
